bug.summary: Caption of wandb.Image does not display newlines
bug.description:
wandb --version && python --version && uname
Weights and Biases version: 0.8.3 Python version: 3.7.3 Operating System: Linux
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
When using newline character "\n" in the caption of wandb.Image, the newline is not displayed in the interface. <denchmark-h:h3>What I Did</denchmark-h>
I used a command such as wandb.Image(sample_image, caption='line1\nline_2') and no newline was displayed. On below example, I expected to have the ground truth and prediction on 2 separate lines. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/715491/60762784-c2e05e00-a02c-11e9-8c64-6fdc9758a505.png></denchmark-link>
You can see it by changing the zoom to high value at this link: <denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/borisd13/simpsons-fastai/runs/g34gpga7>https://app.wandb.ai/borisd13/simpsons-fastai/runs/g34gpga7</denchmark-link>
